application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 10 (Sustainability and Energy Conservation) of planning permission 21/01891/FUL(Erection of extensions and alterations to existing buildings to provide 4no. additional flats; erection of new terrace dwelling to the side of 355 Malden Road; erection of new garage building to the rear of the site; and associated works to provide bin and cycle storage)
decision_conditions: The development when constructed shall achieve at least a 19% improvement in CO2 emissions versus Part L of the Building Regulations and internal water usage rates of no greater than 105L per person per dayReason: In the interests of sustainability and energy conservation, in accordance with policies CS1, DM3 and DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
